name: Zerobreakers HUNTERS RIDE v3.5.0
description:
Zerobreakers

HUNTERS RIDE

Version 3.5.0

It is and endless platform Shooter Game made in Game Maker Studio 2.3+

It has 5 base rooms that are over 4000 px wide.

2 Main types of enemies are in the game, A Humanoid Shooter and A flying ghost.

The player has 11 weapon levels that auto level up based on kills and 4 animations for the ammo as you power up.

once you reach weapon level 9 a mini follower spaceship with unlock and help you fight. The spaceship has it's own AI and will attack targets within it's range.

game controls are keyboard and mouse and may also work with some gaming controllers.

Left/Right :  arrows or A , D  or controller

Jump : UP , W , Spacebar or controller

Shoot(for Player):  left Mouse button or controller [follower Auto Shoots]

Music OnOff: M or 0 (not Numbad)

Music Track: Numbers 1 to 4 (not Numpad)

Shooting SFX reduced: P

I have also Tried to add some Language support: Page Up Will Cycle this.

Cheat useable once per room : Insert Button

Exit: ESC or END on keyboard

Window can me maximized or set as full screen.

Not sure if I have missed Anything, I have done everything myself over time so I cannot remember.

feedback:

zerobreaker.eduent@gmail.com

ENJOY :D
